features: THERMOCHROMIC MULTIPURPOSE TEMPERATURE ACTIVATED COLOR CHANGE PIGMENT -Laboratory testing. We are testing all our products in our laboratory. This is a new, long-efficiency and environmentally friendly material.

description: SET OF 11 DIFFERENT COLORS THERMOCHROMIC MULTIPURPOSE TEMPERATURE ACTIVATED COLOR CHANGE PIGMENT You will receive 1 grams each of PINK, ORANGE, RED/ORANGE, AZURE,GREEN, DARK GREEN, BLACK, BLUE, AQUA, YELLOW, and VIOLET (total 11 grams) This is novel, long-efficiency and environmentally friendly material.When the temperature rises over 88⁰F (33 ⁰C) degree, the pigment turns from one color to colorless. This process is reversible- when it gets temperature to cold, the pigment turns back to its original color. Safety: Non-toxic, Non-radiation, but not intended for consumption Change Color Temperature Range : 28-33 ⁰C **USA CUSTOMERS ONLY***
